item.title: [PI] How would I make everywhere pvp world?
item.dc:creator: @vint0man vint0man
item.description:
@vint0man wrote:

Ok im not a pro at coding or much good for that matter but this should work. First go to
source/src/server/model/players/player.java.
In that find:
“public boolean inWild()”

Right. Now that you have found that, replace:

"public boolean inWild() {

	if(absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3518 && absY < 3966 ||
		absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 9918 && absY < 10366 ||	
		absX > 2539 && absX < 2608 && absY > 3079 && absY < 3106) {
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}"

With:
“public boolean inWild() {
return true;
}”

This will make the whole world into wilderness. You can add an aea which isnt wilderness by adding something like this after it:
“if( ) {
return false;
}”

If you need any more help because you dont understand, pm me and i will send you my skype name.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How would I make everywhere pvp world?
